sentences.english: Some of them were reported among the dead and injured.
sentences.chinese: 据报道，其中死伤者中包括这些礼拜者。

sentences.english: The troops opened fire on workers and killed dozens.
sentences.chinese: 军队在工人上开火，四死伤无数。

sentences.english: See the casualties of students, captain Duan Zhenguo angry scold a meal.
sentences.chinese: 看到死伤的学生们，队长生气的责骂了一顿段振国。

sentences.english: The savage fighting claimed many lives on both sides.
sentences.chinese: 在这场恶战中，双方死伤无数。

sentences.english: Everywhere are the collapsed buildings, such as death or injury to life, a bleak.
sentences.chinese: 所到之处，都是残垣断壁如死伤的生命，一片凄凉。

sentences.english: Many of the dead and injured in the area are family members of military officials.
sentences.chinese: 这里很多死伤者是军队官员的家人。

sentences.english: U. S. forces have paid compensation to families of the dead and to those wounded in the attack.
sentences.chinese: 美国军队对这次袭击的死伤者家庭进行了赔偿。

sentences.english: Smuggling is checked, chant spring personnel casualty is numerous, 3 at the same time inside bottle.
sentences.chinese: 走私被查，咏春人员死伤众多，三支同时内斗。

sentences.english: All of them were construction workers and 2 of the injured were in critical condition.
sentences.chinese: 死伤者均为现场施工工人。

sentences.english: Lots of trees were blown down , Worse still (What's worse) , some people were killed or injured .
sentences.chinese: 许多树木被风刮倒了，更糟糕的是，还死伤了一些人。

sentences.english: Yet a spate of mass killings and injuries by knife or hammer-wielding assailants has continued.
sentences.chinese: 然而由尖刀和锤子引发的大量死伤却没有因此而停止。

sentences.english: Relatives and friends can be killed or injured in alcohol-related accidents and assaults.
sentences.chinese: 在酒精引起的事故和攻击会造成亲属和朋友死伤。

sentences.english: Police used a cable car to ferry down the dead and wounded from the hilltop.
sentences.chinese: 警方使用缆车将死伤者运下山。

sentences.english: Especially during World War I, when the dead and wounded toll hit the double-digit millions.
sentences.chinese: 尤其是在第一次世界大战期间，当死伤数达到1亿时。

sentences.english: Ukrainian President Viktor Yanukovych expressed condolences to relatives of the victims.
sentences.chinese: 乌克兰总统亚努科维奇对死伤者的亲属表示了慰问。

sentences.english: The rebellion action takes a heavy toll of people's life, which is relentlessness.
sentences.chinese: 这次造反，百姓死伤惨重，这是不仁。

definition: to be wounded/to sustain an injury
the few are no match for the many/heavily outnumbered/facing impossible odds (idiom)
to besiege/to beleaguer/to attack from all sides/to jointly speak or write against sb
to flee in disorder/defeated and in rout
total defeat of an army (idiom); fig. a complete wipeout
the multitude against the few, a wide disparity (idiom from Mencius); heavily outnumbered/unequally matched/overwhelmed by weight of numbers
